definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

sentences.english: As has been the case before, the military can be a trailblazer for the private sector.
sentences.chinese: 跟以往一樣，美軍可爲私營企業開創道路。

sentences.english: Army now has 40,000 soldiers in Germany.
sentences.chinese: 美軍目前在德國駐有4萬兵力。

sentences.english: Four US copters have gone down in Iraq in recent weeks.
sentences.chinese: 近幾周來，已經有四架美軍直升機在伊拉克墜落。

sentences.english: A large U. S. military base is located in Khost.
sentences.chinese: 一個大型美軍基地就建在霍斯特市。

sentences.english: There was a US base here until just two years ago.
sentences.chinese: 直到兩年前，冰島還有一個美軍基地駐守。

sentences.english: Then the marines came out empty-handed.
The American truck had already been towed away.
sentences.chinese: 那輛美軍卡車已經被拖走了。

sentences.english: They then ferried the body out for a quick burial at sea.
sentences.chinese: 隨後，美軍迅速將其屍體海葬。

sentences.english: Militants also attacked the US military's main airport in Afghanistan with rockets.
sentences.chinese: 武裝分子還使用火箭襲擊了美軍的主要軍用機場。

sentences.english: The presence of US military alone will boost the economy of Subic.
sentences.chinese: 美軍的存在本身就會提振蘇比克的經濟。

sentences.english: The first marine was stuck, maybe three-quarters of the way up the stairway.
sentences.chinese: 第一個美軍被卡住了，也許是在樓梯往上四分之三處。

sentences.english: Contact with the headquarters of the U. S. military, ensure accurate airdrop of traded goods.
sentences.chinese: 與美軍總部聯繫，確保能夠準確空投交易的物品。

sentences.english: French townspeople lay flowers on the body of an American soldier.
sentences.chinese: 法國市民在美軍士兵屍體上安放鮮花。

sentences.english: Other remote American outposts have closed too.
sentences.chinese: 其他偏遠的美軍前哨據點也已被關閉。

sentences.english: Tribal dispute on the trouble caused, the U. S. military have personal experience.
sentences.chinese: 對由部落之爭而引發的麻煩，美軍有切身體會。

sentences.english: There are now about 147, 000 U.S. troops in Iraq.
sentences.chinese: 目前約有14萬7千名美軍駐守伊拉克。

definition: opportunity in a battle/fighter aircraft/war secret
